# GCInputLeftShoulder

**Global Variable**

The name of the left shoulder button.

## Declaration

```swift
var GCInputLeftShoulder: String { get }
```

## Related Documentation

- **leftShoulder**: The controller’s left shoulder button element.

## Shoulder button names

- **GCInputRightShoulder**: The name of the right shoulder button.
